Sentencas: A novel material family for electrolyte in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), i.e., BIMGVOX, Bi4MgxV2-xO11-delta (0 <= x <= 0.3), were synthesized by solid state reaction.
Titulo: Structural and conductivity characteristics of Bi4MgxV2-xO11-δ (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.3) as solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature SOFC application

Sentencas: In order to examine the effects of dopant cation concentration on gamma-phase stability (vacancy disordering phenomena) and ionic conductivity, structure and electrical conductivity of BIMGVOX were investigated using X-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscopy and AC impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Structural and conductivity characteristics of Bi4MgxV2-xO11-δ (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.3) as solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature SOFC application

Sentencas: Compositional dependence of the conductivity behavior as a function of temperature was found.
Titulo: Structural and conductivity characteristics of Bi4MgxV2-xO11-δ (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.3) as solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature SOFC application

Sentencas: The change of slopes observed in the Arrhenius plots was in agreement with the phase transitions for all the compositions.
Titulo: Structural and conductivity characteristics of Bi4MgxV2-xO11-δ (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.3) as solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature SOFC application

Sentencas: The stabilisation of highly conducting gamma-phase was found when x >= 0.2.
Titulo: Structural and conductivity characteristics of Bi4MgxV2-xO11-δ (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.3) as solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature SOFC application

Sentencas: The highest low temperature ionic conductivity (sigma(300) = 1.18 x 10(-3) S cm(-1)) of the Mg-substituted compound was observed for the composition of x = 0.2 as compared with other doped samples of the same series, attributing to its low activation energy.
Titulo: Structural and conductivity characteristics of Bi4MgxV2-xO11-δ (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.3) as solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature SOFC application

Sentencas: Since the grain size and its phase distribution had great influence on the conductivity, various sintering parameters were also investigated for all samples.
Titulo: Structural and conductivity characteristics of Bi4MgxV2-xO11-δ (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.3) as solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature SOFC application
